result.eng: Drink and sandwiches will be available.
result.ga: Beidh deoch agus ceapairí ar fáil
result.orig: Beidh deoch agus ceapairí ar fáil
result.html: Beidh deoch agus ceapairí ar fáilDrink and sandwiches will be available.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deoċ agus ceapairí ar fáilDrink and sandwiches will be available.

result.eng: Wine and refreshements will be available.
result.ga: Beidh fíon agus sólaistí le fáil
result.orig: Beidh fíon agus sólaistí le fáil
result.html: Beidh fíon agus sólaistí le fáilWine and refreshements will be available.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ fíon agus sólaistí le fáilWine and refreshements will be available.

result.eng: It will be available on the Internet.
result.ga: Beidh sé ar fáil ar an Idirlíon
result.orig: Beidh sé ar fáil ar an Idirlíon
result.html: Beidh sé ar fáil ar an IdirlíonIt will be available on the Internet.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé ar fáil ar an IdirlíonIt will be available on the Internet.

result.eng: He makes his expertise available generously.
result.ga: Cuireann sé a chuid saineolais ar fáil go fial
result.orig: Cuireann sé a chuid saineolais ar fáil go fial
result.html: Cuireann sé a chuid saineolais ar fáil go fialHe makes his expertise available generously.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé a ċuid saineolais ar fáil go fialHe makes his expertise available generously.

result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.eng: It seems that not many jobs are available.
result.ga: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil mórán postanna le fáil
result.orig: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil mórán postanna le fáil
result.html: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil mórán postanna le fáilIt seems that not many jobs are available.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuma ar an scéal naċ ḃfuil mórán postanna le fáilIt seems that not many jobs are available.

result.eng: A lot of services are available.
result.html: Tá an-chuid seirbhísí ar fáilA lot of services are available.
result.ponchtml: Tá an-ċuid seirḃísí ar fáilA lot of services are available.

result.eng: A leaflet in Irish is available on request.

result.html: Tá bileog as Gaeilge le fáil ach í a iarraidhA leaflet in Irish is available on request.
result.ponchtml: Tá bileog as Gaeilge le fáil aċ í a iarraiḋA leaflet in Irish is available on request.

result.eng: An information leaflet is available at request.

result.orig: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.html: Tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidhAn information leaflet is available at request.

result.eng: A link is available from the home page.
result.ga: Tá nasc ar fáil ón phríomhleathanach
result.orig: Tá nasc ar fáil ón phríomhleathanach
result.html: Tá nasc ar fáil ón phríomhleathanachA link is available from the home page.

result.eng: More information is available from the office.
result.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifig
result.orig: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifig
result.html: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifigMore information is available from the office.

result.eng: Irish language news is available on the radio.
result.ga: Bíonn nuacht as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidió
result.orig: Bíonn nuacht as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidió
result.html: Bíonn nuacht as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidióIrish language news is available on the radio.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn nuaċt as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidióIrish language news is available on the radio.

result.eng: News is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.
result.ga: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin
result.orig: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin
result.html: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisinNews is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn nuaċt le fáil ag a seaċt a ċlog ar TG4 freisinNews is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.

result.eng: I like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.

result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom na geansaiṫe Árann atá le fáil i siopa StandúinI like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.

result.eng: This information is available openly in newspapers and on the Internet.
result.ga: Tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuachtáin agus ar an Idirlíon

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
